featured.text: __(23)__ the Health Ministry and the Malaria Center, The CAMBODIA DAILY will distribute the nets to the most__(24)__ areas of the country. __(25)__ to this campaign and save three lives for only $5, send your donation to: American Assistance for Cambodia, P.O. Box 2716, GPO, New York, NY 10116.

definition.zh_def: 群組政策物件，指在Windows操作系統中用於管理和配置計算機和用戶設置的集合。
definition.en_def: Group Policy Object, a collection used in Windows operating systems to manage and configure computer and user settings.
definition.example: The IT department implemented a new GPO to enhance security across all company computers.
